content: I am new to this process and did some reading and saw this tool org.hl7.fhir.igpublisher that would create the new HTML for me. I download the JAR file and run the command but I am getting this error >Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Error: unknown version 1.9.0
hmm that error should not have slipped out into production. just check: what version is the IG you are building?
thx. can you paste the next few lines of output, down to Load hl7.fhir.core-??? package
